description:
As coach of the fujimi soccer club`s coach, Takei Miwa decides to take the club to their very first training camp!
With the help of Zaizen Kaoru`s sister, Karin, who fully utilizes the Zaizen group`s resources, the training camp turns into something unimaginably big.
Summer! Sea! Test of courage! ...wait, what about practice?
A totally unique summer experience is about to begin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Miwa-chan Wants to Do a Training Camp
美和ちゃんは合宿がしたい
